channel.title: Embedding Redash Application within iFrame
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
Hello, I am interested in embedding the entire Redash application within an iFrame. Is this an option on Redash V10.1.0?
The goal is to make some minor UI changes without having to maintain a fork. We have a pre-existing iFrame framework, so if this is an option, it would be easier for us to maintain.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 10.1.0 * Browser/OS: chrome v97.0.4692.71 / macos v11.6.2 * How did you install Redash: contrib-helm-chart

item.title: Embedding Redash Application within iFrame
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
This isn’t officially supported. The last time someone posted about it I believe Chrome’s iframe security rules made it impossible. It’s not recommended.

Read full topic

item.title: Embedding Redash Application within iFrame
item.dc:creator: mains
item.description:
Issue Summary

Hello, I am interested in embedding the entire Redash application within an iFrame. Is this an option on Redash V10.1.0?

The goal is to make some minor UI changes without having to maintain a fork. We have a pre-existing iFrame framework, so if this is an option, it would be easier for us to maintain.

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 10.1.0
  • Browser/OS: chrome v97.0.4692.71 / macos v11.6.2
  • How did you install Redash: contrib-helm-chart
